comments.comments_text: Tomas Soucek (West Ham) has tested the patience of referee Michael Dean and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has tested the patience of referee [REFEREE] and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: Aaron Cresswell (West Ham) will deliver the ball into the penalty box from a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) will deliver the ball into the penalty box from a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Youri Tielemans (Leicester) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates as he overhits the effort.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates as he overhits the effort.

comments.comments_text: It's in! Vladimir Coufal spots his teammate in a good position on the edge of the box and provides him with a nice pass. Jesse Lingard (West Ham) doesn't think twice and rifles a first-time shot into the bottom right corner. The score is now 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's in! [PLAYER] spots his teammate in a good position on the edge of the box and provides him with a nice pass. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) doesn't think twice and rifles a first-time shot into the bottom right corner. The score is now 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Michael Dean shows the yellow card to Aaron Cresswell (West Ham) for a heavy challenge.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows the yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for a heavy challenge.

comments.comments_text: Youri Tielemans (Leicester) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. Leicester have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.

comments.comments_text: Michael Dean shows a yellow card to Ricardo Pereira (Leicester) for a tough tackle.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [REFEREE] shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for a tough tackle.

comments.comments_text: Leicester failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Jarrod Bowen shows great vision to find Jesse Lingard (West Ham) with a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time shot is precise and sails low into the middle of the goal. 2:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] shows great vision to find [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) with a cheeky pass inside the box, and his first-time shot is precise and sails low into the middle of the goal. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Referee Michael Dean points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. Jesse Lingard (West Ham) goes wild in celebration.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Referee [REFEREE] points to the centre spot to indicate that the goal stands after the VAR review. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) goes wild in celebration.

comments.comments_text: Wesley Fofana (Leicester) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Michael Dean ignores the protests.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but [REFEREE] ignores the protests.

comments.comments_text: We are about to witness a subsitution. Luke Thomas (Leicester) for Daniel Amartey.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: We are about to witness a subsitution. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: The foul by Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Michael Dean.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The foul by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by [REFEREE].

comments.comments_text: Goal! Jarrod Bowen (West Ham) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from Tomas Soucek, then sends the ball inside the right post. 3:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) finds himself some space inside the box to get on the end of a pass from [PLAYER], then sends the ball inside the right post. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: David William Moyes is forced to make a change. Aaron Cresswell is unable to continue due to injury, Fabian Balbuena (West Ham) comes on.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: David William [PLAYER] is forced to make a change. [PLAYER] is unable to continue due to injury, [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes on.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net and Issa Diop (West Ham) gets on the scoresheet!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It's in the back of the net and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gets on the scoresheet!

comments.comments_text: Dennis Praet will be replaced by Marc Albrighton (Leicester).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] will be replaced by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Marc Albrighton (Leicester) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Ricardo Pereira tees up Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) on the edge of the box and he fires the ball into the right side of the goal. 3:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] tees up [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) on the edge of the box and he fires the ball into the right side of the goal. 3:1.

comments.comments_text: Marc Albrighton (Leicester) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Mark Noble leaves the pitch and Benjamin Johnson (West Ham) comes on.

comments.comments_text: Marc Albrighton (Leicester) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: David William Moyes prepares a substitution. Jarrod Bowen is replaced by Mohamed Said Benrahma (West Ham).

comments.comments_text: Marc Albrighton (Leicester) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 3:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 3:2.

comments.comments_text: The expression of the referee Michael Dean is crystal clear. This behaviour won't be tolerated. Arthur Masuaku (West Ham) is shown a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The expression of the referee [REFEREE] is crystal clear. This behaviour won't be tolerated. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is shown a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Youri Tielemans (Leicester) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.

comments.comments_text: Marc Albrighton (Leicester) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Leicester will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Marc Albrighton (Leicester) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
